lines.text: Get out of the grave, Alan. Get out of the grave and let an artist show you how to call a curse down on Satan!
Man is a machine that manufactures manure.

[to Orville's corpse]
I'm gonna take your scraps and feed them to my dog.
Silence! The magnitude of your simplitude overwhelms me!
You mean this whole thing was a gag?
No, these are couple of real ghouls! They've just had a change of heart!
Yeah, we're trying to go straight!
You mean this whole thing was a gag?
No, these are couple of real ghouls! They've just had a change of heart!
Yeah, we're trying to go straight!
The ten-cent tour, which we get for only a quarter.
Gee, Mr. Wizard, how do you get the litmus paper to turn blue?
The same way I get the egg into the Coke bottle, bitch.
Will you quit giving us a play-by-play of your flabby bladder?
